display_long_description:
MazeRunner VR is an immersive sci-fi maze adventure that tests both reflexes and strategy.

As humanity’s last commander, you are trapped within alien-controlled labyrinths where reality itself shifts around you. Your mission is clear: collect four types of energy keys, unlock the Gate of Return, and reclaim the path back to Earth.
[media]
🌌 Core Gameplay
	•	Dynamic Mazes – The labyrinth constantly reconfigures itself at timed intervals. Old paths seal shut while new routes emerge. Adapt quickly or risk being trapped.
	•	Energy Key Collection – Gather yellow, red, green, and purple keys, each tied to unique challenges: scattered in corridors, hidden in crates, or dropped by defeated enemies. Only by collecting enough can you open the exit.
[media]
	•	Alien Threats – Mysterious entities lurk in the shadows. Evade, outsmart, or fight them with weapons you discover.
	•	Time Pressure – Each level is timed. When the countdown ends, the maze seals permanently.
[media]
🎮 VR Interaction
	•	Swing your arms to move, simulating running.
	•	Jump across traps and obstacles.
	•	Grab and use weapons for ranged or melee combat.
	•	Track progress in real-time — press the controller’s menu button to check your key collection.
[media]
🗝️ Progression & Levels

Travel through six unique environments — from quantum matrices and spaceports to cyber cities and alien ruins. With each level, the challenge grows:
	•	Larger, more complex mazes
	•	Higher key requirements
	•	Stronger alien threats
	•	Faster maze shifts
[media]
